subdisciplines.name: Music Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people perceive, experience, and respond to music and musical stimuli.

subdisciplines.name: Music History
subdisciplines.description: The study of the development of music over time, including its social, cultural, and political contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Music Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and composition of music, including analysis, notation, and harmony.
